website_summaries.verdict: Nice price for a battle rope that has an optional waterproof sleeve for use in outdoor conditions.
pros: Offered at a good price for a 40-foot length and a 1.5-inch diameter battle rope
All-black rope includes a yellow tracking line that makes it easier to maintain
Should work well for all types of exercise you want to perform with the rope
Includes a waterproof sleeve you can place around the rope for protection against the elements
cons: Handles seem a little thin versus some other models
Not quite as durable as some

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the strands on yours are all tight. Mine was not!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm no nautical expert, but seeing frays and treads coming unbuckled from the moment I unpacked it is a little disappointing. Battle rope is a great excercise. Really gets the heart pumping. However, I'm afraid to use this equipment to its maximum potential since I noticed several strands coming loose from the rope. I'd like to be able to keep pushing my limits, but unsure if this product will allow me the opportunity to really get shredded! Given normal wear and tear, I'd see no issue to concern myself with. Though when it comes out of the box with signs of how poorly it was constructed, then, well...
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: They love to hate it
customer_reviews.text: I am using this at my Karate School for some extra circuit training for my students. They love to hate it, but love it none the less. It is a great intro-level rope (the 1.5"), but it will get people tired even for the advanced. Good product with many uses to come.
customer_reviews.author: Cody T

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I will buy this rope again
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and some were pretty bad. Thinking/hoping they had made some improvements by the time I ordered it but I am sorry to say I am rather disappointed in the rope. I have had the rope for less than three weeks and I am seeing signs of rupturing in a couple of spots. I see now I am going to have to resort to using duct tape or see about getting a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the home gym. Very sturdy, superb quality, expect it to last a long time. just what the doctor ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product!! using these everyday and still look and feel great
customer_reviews.author: MIN JU HA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Can't wait to set it up in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Tlclem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and quite heavy for what it is. Does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product can sooner than expected. So for no problems..
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely impressed with your product and the quality of your customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! 40ft length was a permeates addition to my home gym and very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Challenging and fun.
customer_reviews.text: 40 feet for beginners is perfect. Used a short piece of small rope as an anchor in the middle. Great workout with fast movements....no boring, slow lifts! Works arms, shoulders, core.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The 30' would have been just fine, but the extra weight makes for a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: M Mangan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poor response from Yaheetech! They offered me $10. to keep it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
